articles.author: Tom Balmforth, Max Hunder
articles.title: Ukrainian forces take up new positions in the east as Putin proclaims victory in Luhansk - The Globe and Mail
articles.description: Russia’s capture of the city of Lysychansk on Sunday brought an end to one of the biggest battles in Europe for generations
articles.content: A local resident walks past an apartment building heavily damaged during Ukraine-Russia conflict in the city of Sievierodonetsk in the Luhansk Region, Ukraine, July 1, 2022.ALEXANDER ERMOCHENKO/Reute… [+6377 chars]

articles.author: Erin Prater
articles.title: WHO monkeypox emergency committee to reconvene ‘shortly’ as cases triple in Europe: It’s a ‘fast-moving outbreak that with every hour, day, and week is extending its reach’ - Fortune
articles.description: The World Health Organization's monkeypox emergency committee will "revisit its position shortly" due to the "rapid evolution and emergency nature" of the global outbreak, the organization said Friday, warning that cases in Europe have tripled since mid-June.
